title: Trump says Nvidia's high-end Blackwell chip did not figure in talks with China's Xi
description:
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Thursday he did not discuss chipmaker Nvidia's state-of-art Blackwell artificial intelligence chip during talks with Chinese President Xi Jinping.
"We're not talking about Blackwell chips," Trump told reporters aboard Air Force One, after leaving the meeting with Xi, their first since he returned to the White House. En route to South Korea on Wednesday, he said he might discuss the chip with the Chinese leader.

title: Character.AI to ban children under 18 from talking to its chatbots
description: Artificial intelligence startup Character.AI will ban kids from having conversations with chatbots on its platform following growing pressure from lawmakers and a raft of lawsuits alleging the company's so-called characters are responsible for harms to children.

title: Big Tech’s AI Bets: Mixed market reactions after Q3 earnings
description: Shares in three of the “Magnificent Seven” — Alphabet, Microsoft, and Meta — moved in different directions in after-hours trading after they released their third-quarter results. The earnings once again underscored how artificial intelligence continues to dominate Big Tech’s growth story and investor sentiment. (Source: Reuters) Tech Titans’ Mixed Earnings Reaction

title: Microsoft beats expectations with 18% revenue jump, but shares slide
